abstract: Jason Kilar, who helped build Hulu into a popular online video site, said he would step down, and provided no indication of what he would do next.
snippet: Jason Kilar, who helped build Hulu into a popular online video site, said he would step down, and provided no indication of what he would do next.
lead_paragraph: 8:39 p.m. | Updated Jason Kilar, the Web wizard who turned Hulu from a punch line into a popular source of online video, said on Friday that he would step down as the site’s founding chief executive in the next three months.

headline.main: Hulu’s Chief Is Leaving, Raising Questions About Its Future
headline.print_headline: Hulu’s Chief Is Leaving, Raising Questions About Its Future

byline.original: By Brian Stelter and Amy Chozick
